text: As I approach the collection of hat themed apartments, I notice one with a door cracked open and the lights off.
I walk towards it and find some small remnants of cake frosting on the floor.
The footprint trail had faded a bit ago, so this can only mean that this is the place.
As I step forward I hear some shifting noises coming from inside.
Fearing the suspect may be attempting to flee, I enter the building and look around.
